term.title: connectivity

item.text: In a chemical context, the information content of a line formula, but omitting any indication of bond multiplicity.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 1077. 'Glossary of terms used in physical organic chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 1099 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466051077)
